com.example.aishuatiserver.mapper

接口 SubjectMapper


  • @Mapper
public interface SubjectMapper

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法

      void choiceSubject(int stuId, int subjectId) 
      int getAvailableSubjectCount(int stuId) 
      int getMaxSubjectId() 
      int getMySelectCount(int stu) 
      java.lang.Integer getSubjectIdByName(java.lang.String subjectName) 
      SubjectInfo getSubjectInfo(int subjectId) 
      Subject isHad(java.lang.String subjectName, int majorId)

      java.util.List<SubjectInfo> showSubjectList(int stuId, int offset, int size) 

    • 方法详细资料

      • getMaxSubjectId

        @Select(value="select IFNULL(max(subject_Id),0) from subject")
int getMaxSubjectId()

      • getAvailableSubjectCount

        @Select(value="select count(*) from subject where subject_id in (select subject_id from `subject` where major_id in (select stu_majorId from\n student where stu_Id = #{stu}) and subject_level in (select stu_level from student where stu_Id = #{stu}))")
int getAvailableSubjectCount(int stuId)

      • addSubject

        @Insert(value="insert into subject values(#{subjectId},#{majorId},#{subjectName},#{subjectLevel})")
void addSubject(Subject subject)

      • isHad

        @Select(value="select subject_Id as subjectId,major_Id as majorId,subject_Name as subjectName,subject_level as subjectLevel from subject where subject_Name=#{subjectName} and major_Id = #{majorId}")
Subject isHad(java.lang.String subjectName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      int majorId)

      • showSubjectList

        @Select(value="select subjectId,majorName,subjectName,subjectLevel from (select subject_Id as subjectId,marjor_Name as majorName,subject_Name as subjectName,subject_level as subjectLevel from `subject` left join major on `subject`.major_Id = major.major_Id) as b\nleft join (select stu_Id,marjor_Name,stu_level FROM student left join major on student.stu_majorId = major.major_Id where stu_Id = #{stuId}) as a on b.majorName = a.marjor_Name limit #{offset},#{size}")
java.util.List<SubjectInfo> showSubjectList(int stuId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                int size)

      • showMySelectSubject

        @Select(value="select subject_Id as subjectId,major_Id as majorId,subject_Name as subjectName,subject_level as subjectLevel from subject where \nsubject_Id in (select subject_Id from possesse where stu_Id = #{stuId}) limit #{offset},#{size}")
java.util.List<SubjectInfo> showMySelectSubject(int stuId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    int size)

      • getMySelectCount

        @Select(value="select count(*) from subject where subject_Id in (select subject_id from possesse where stu_id = #{stuId})")
int getMySelectCount(int stu)

      • choiceSubject

        @Insert(value="insert into possesse values(#{stuId},#{subjectId})")
void choiceSubject(int stuId,
                                                                                        int subjectId)

      • getSubjectIdByName

        @Select(value="select subject_Id from subject where subject_Name = #{subjectName}")
java.lang.Integer getSubjectIdByName(java.lang.String subjectName)

      • getSubjectInfo

        @Select(value="select subject_Id as subjectId,major_Id as majorId,subject_Name as subjectName,subject_level as subjectLevel from subject where subject_Id = #{subjectId}")
SubjectInfo getSubjectInfo(int subjectId)
